title: Add Timmy & Ricay survival tip attribution and code entry gate (2112)

requirements.text: Update the SurvivalGuideSection component to rebrand the section heading and attribution so it reads 'Timmy and Ricay's Survival Tips' (or styled variant like 'Timmy & Ricay's Survival Tips'). The five existing survival tips should remain unchanged in content; only the section title/byline attribution must reflect both names. Keep the existing distressed typewriter aesthetic.

quotes: put the names timmy and ricays survival tips

acceptanceCriteria: The SurvivalGuideSection heading or byline visibly includes both 'Timmy' and 'Ricay' as attributed authors of the survival tips
The five original survival tip texts are unchanged
The distressed monospace/typewriter styling is preserved

requirements.text: Implement a full-screen code entry gate that blocks access to all site content until the user submits the correct code '2112'. When the site loads, display a full-screen overlay (matching the Backrooms/Dreamcore aesthetic — void black background, fluorescent accent, monospace font) with a prompt such as 'Enter Access Code' and a text input field plus a submit button. If the user submits '2112', dismiss the gate and reveal the site. If they submit an incorrect code, display an in-place error message (e.g., 'ACCESS DENIED') with a subtle flicker animation and keep the gate visible. The gate state should persist for the browser session (sessionStorage) so refreshing the page does not re-show the gate after a successful entry.

quotes: u haft to submit a code to enter and the code will be 2112

acceptanceCriteria: On first load, a full-screen overlay gate is displayed over all site content
The gate is styled with Backrooms/Dreamcore palette (void black, fluorescent yellow-green accents, monospace font, grain texture)
Submitting the code '2112' dismisses the gate and reveals the full site
Submitting any incorrect code shows an 'ACCESS DENIED' error message and keeps the gate open
On incorrect submission, a flicker or glitch animation plays on the error message
After successful entry, the unlocked state is stored in sessionStorage so the gate does not reappear on page refresh within the same session
The gate is fully responsive on mobile and desktop

constraints: The correct access code must be exactly '2112' — do not change it
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
The five survival tip texts in SurvivalGuideSection must not be altered
nonGoals: Backend authentication or server-side code verification
Persistent login across sessions (localStorage long-term storage) — sessionStorage is sufficient
Changing any other section content beyond the SurvivalGuideSection attribution
